website_summaries.verdict: These women’s socks are sold in a 4-pack and made of warm and soft 86% extra-fine merino wool, making them perfect for cold temperatures.
pros: Soft socks that supply ample padding in the toe, heel, and bottom of foot for comfort
These keep feet warm, even in the coldest temperatures
Thinner material that’s ideal for wearing with snow boots
cons: There is minimal padding on the top of the foot of these socks

customer_reviews.title: Oooooooh Soooooo Comfy & Soft & Snuggly Warm!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the socks might not really be as warm and comfortable as a thicker wool boot sock, but to my surprise, they are wonderful. The extra thickness added to the sole area is especially sweet. Hiking or snow boots tend to run a bit large, so a boot sock is usually thicker. If you're looking for a super thick sock to wear in a heavier boot, these won't fit that bill. These fit like a standard sock but with extra cushion on the bottom. However if you're looking for a delightfully WARM and super SOFT wool sock, look no further. I'm definitely going to buy several more packages as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Mom of Harstine Island

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These really are great socks. They fit perfectly. (I hate when the heel doesn’t exactly sit right.) They keep my feet nice and warm in cool weather. There is nice padding in the soles. When it is frigid out, I can wear two pair and still be comfortable (without it being too bulky). After a few washes, they get fuzzballs. That doesn’t bother me. It has no effect on the functionality or comfort of the socks. They really are very nice socks. Unexpectedly, I received an extra pair of socks as a free gift with my order. It was a very nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Wow so warm!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for wool socks that were high in wool content and not so much a blended fibers, and easy on the pocket book. These socks certainly delivered in all my checkboxes. Soft and warm, wore these on a night out in mid 30s F degrees temps in regular sneakers and my toes did not freeze as I typically do with cotton socks. Plus they’re high elastic so some might think they’re too tight to be comfortable but they wrap about mid calf and stay there. What was more pleasant was the bonus zip packaging it came in with as well as a gifted scarf. Just what I needed for my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: I like these socks.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they do wear out a bit more quickly than some socks, but overall I still really like them. They are super comfortable, soft, and with the wool content they help my feet to stay dry better. I do have to say I haven't used them for hiking, but rather I use them as work socks and for just wearing around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but functional
customer_reviews.text: These socks seemed like a really good deal so I bought them for outdoor adventures during the winter ie snowshoeing and hiking. They work fine, but are pretty low quality. I've washed them appropriately, but they are already full of snags and "fluffs" after using each pair once. My guess is that they won't last very long. I guess that's what happens when you buy "cheap" wool socks.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Okay not great
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I have had these for a few weeks. I love the look and feel of these socks. But, after washing them per their instructions a few times, the elastic string to hold the top together has broken and is unraveling on 3 of the pairs. I have also noticed that on the inside of the sock, the thread edges have gotten longer/Frizzier with each wash. In regards to the size, I am a 9.5 and these are a little big. But still comfy. Overall, I like the socks. But, I am disappointed over the amount of money I had to spend and how fast they are unraveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A Stairs

customer_reviews.title: Just buy the socks
customer_reviews.text: I needed some summer hiking socks for an August trip to Yosemite. It was over 90 degrees there and every part of my body was dripping in sweat. These socks were great for keeping my feet cool as well as protecting my precious ankles from blistering on my brand new hiking boots. I wear a women's size 6 and felt like these were great and could fit larger feet. I'm used to wearing baggy socks since I have small feet. I think these will be great year round socks. I usually use SmartWool and Lululemon socks for outdoorsy things but I found these had a bit more thickness to keep my feet comfortable against the rigidness of my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Miller

customer_reviews.title: So, so, so, soft!
customer_reviews.text: I need wool dress socks to keep my feet warm during the winter months and these will fit the bill. They are so soft on my feet, thick enough to keep my feet warm without shoes, and thin enough for me to wear my slip-on loafers. Perfect socks!
customer_reviews.author: Optix

customer_reviews.title: A great, thinner wool sock
customer_reviews.text: These are thinner than regular wool socks, so they're perfect for my more fashionable boots. Thick wool socks won't fit but trouser socks and tights won't keep my feet warm. I wouldn't wear these for winter hiking but they're perfect for walking to work and I bet they'll be wonderful for spring and summer hikes. And so far they've washed well too. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Starts out nice, but fabric looks to be wearing out fast
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap Smartwool substitute (couldn’t bear the thought of paying $22 for a single pair of socks?!), so I tried these. On the first wearing they were cute and comfy. But the fabric quickly started pilling, making them less cute, and after washing it felt slightly scratchier, making them less comfy. I’ll bet these socks develop bare spots within 5 washings. The trade-off for their low cost is their low durability.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks, great quality for the price. The wick moisture, keeping my feet dry and warm! The only thing for me is that while the foot fits fine the calf is tight. Which ends up leaving marks on my skin and over leggings fits even more snug. Sometimes uncomfortable after a long day when you take them off. But this doesn’t stop me from wearing them almost every day this winter.
customer_reviews.author: JeepGirl1893

customer_reviews.title: Great socks-highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with these socks. They are super soft, stretchy without being slouchy, and they stay up. I wear size 10 shoe, and sometimes socks just kind of “squeeze” my feet uncomfortably, but not these; they fit perfectly. I don’t want to wear any other kind now.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: What a surprise! :)
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by this order. FIRST of all the packaging was adorable - these socks came in a cute little CASE with a SCARF!!! Totally unexpected. They were rolled up and presented in a fancy and cute way and once I put them on I was even more excited about my purchase. They are cozy and high quality and I love the pattern. It’s the little things - I feel like the seller really tried to make it a cute experience to receive their product and it totally showed. Most sellers won’t go that extra mile so it’s noticeable. <3
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Very tight
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 7.5 and I am quite thin and this socks were so tight could not wear them. Also these are itchy and not soft. They really don't feel at all like smartwool or other of that caliber. For the price, I didn't really expect that, but these are very thin and feel a little bit more like nylon. On the plus side , they are well made, and the pattern is lovely, so it would work well for dress socks. Also packed and shipped very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: mg New York

customer_reviews.title: Came with a free gift!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought LL Bean boots and need affordable thin wool socks for them. I ordered these, but as you can see they came with so much more! The fleece scarf and gloves are so cute and clearly labeled “gift”. Since no one in my life likes pink I will donate them to charity. Thank you, seller!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great . More stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many types of quality socks. I recently got rid of my old worn out socks: so I went searching for “ amazing quality socks” upon looking I found these. Read the reviews and thought I deserve to treat myself so I finally got them I tried them out and yeah their soft . Their comfortable and cool looking/ stylish. BUT they kinda are idk have a weird feel on the bottom compared to these other socks I bought that are higher quality. So I would rate it a 4. But yeah their good enough but not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as the same socks I bought previously
customer_reviews.text: I love the 4 pack of these I bought previously, each a different pattern  The old socks are so, so soft, completely comfortable and don't slip down when walking - bliss. These socks are nice, but not nearly as soft. They improved slightly after washing, but just aren't the same sock as I bought previously. So I'm disappointed and debated just 3 stars - but ended up at 4 stars for that and for being a bit over-priced.
customer_reviews.author: J. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: I received 7 socks instead of 8. I didn't return them because it was too close to my trip to get more. I find them to be very comfortable. It has been 4 months since I bought them and don't wear them every day, but they are already starting to get fuzzy. Not pilling just fuzzy. Like the yarn is unraveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Not short, which is appreciated, quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear with snow boots. The weight is medium, they are stretchy and spongy soft throughout, with extra loft in the soles. I am glad that their tall enough to come up past my boots. Plus, the seller sent a gift pair of socks 😯, who does that! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, and had a horrible formaldehyde smell. I didn't even bother to try to wash them. Didn't want formaldehyde in my clothes washer! They come in a nylon zip-pac with a Chinese pattern on it. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when I first bought them, but after only a year the bottom of every one has worn through and has huge holes. Cheap cotton socks last longer than that, for this price I would expect more than a year of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft, without being to thick
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks for winter running. They're thinner on top of the foot and thicker on the bottom and toes. I was skeptical on how warm they would be. They remind me more of dress socks. I was wrong they have been great so far. I also love how they arrived in a cute little reusable zip pouch with a extra gift, a scarf, from the seller. Nice touch. I would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanikalr

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived well packed in a medium size cosmetic zippered bag, that can be reused. I was pleasantly surprised with this and also in the bag I found two gift items, that I love. I haven't worn the socks yet but they appear to be well made and very soft. Thank you fir the free gifts and the wonderful packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: My favorite socks of life
customer_reviews.text: Merino wool socks are sometimes a confusing buy. Sometimes they’re called merino, but don’t actually have a very high wool content. Sometimes they come as these fluffy socks that you can pretty much only wear to bed. These are warm without making your feet sweat, and they actually keep your feet from smelling. I’ve worn them in the UK in the winter and in Florida in the winter (it’s been over 80° some days) and they’re comfortable in both climates. I might add that they are soooo soft!
customer_reviews.author: Danica Gillotti

customer_reviews.title: Not as depicted, very dull in color, more purple than blue.
customer_reviews.text: Picture is not at all how vibrant they are, which is not at all, they are completely dull which defeats the purpose of why I bought them, I actually thought they were an entirely different product and was waiting for these to arrive, now I see that woops this is them. They are really more purple-ish than blue as well. Not as thick as I was hoping, but I don't know that anything said they would be just saying not the most pleased, especially looking at how awesome they look in the picture it re-saddens me to think its not real.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Loved these socks. I originally got them for Zion in November but ended up using them for a hot and dry 10-mile hike this Labor Day. They are lightweight and my feet stayed cool and dry. I will still try them out for Zion come November but I doubt they will keep my feet very warm. Will update after.
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks and Ordered Twice!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. They are soft and cute. The packaging was really sweet - they came with a fleece scarf and gloves as a free bonus on a cute reusable pouch, which was a nice surprise! I ordered them again today since they are the only socks I want to wear now. I also like that they have a little more stretch than thicker wool socks and I can pull them up to show over the top of my boots if I want. Yay socks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & perfect
customer_reviews.text: Sooo perfect I just bought another set. Soft, seamless, high quality fibers. Great stretch. The black gray marl goes with everything. Love.
customer_reviews.author: alexbaltimore

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute and great after wash
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks, waited till i washed them to see if I still love them and I do. Went back to buy more of the same color and they are out 😭😭😭 I don’t like other colors
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya

customer_reviews.title: Good sock for the money
customer_reviews.text: The product reviews had three different statements as to the fiber content of these socks, so I purchased them with some hesitation, since I was hoping for mostly-wool, and the product page did not state fiber content in detail. I'm pleased to report these socks are 84% wool! They are a good weight and appear to be well made. I wear a size 9.5 shoe, and these fit me very well.
customer_reviews.author: JoLynn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, comfortable, soft and warm socks
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfy socks. I purchased these for a trip to Scotland. I want my feet to be warm and dry. The seller even included an extra pair. I’ll update the review after I’ve road tested. But, so far I’m very happy. Update: I hand washed one pair and hung them to dry in the bathroom and it took about 12 hours for them to dry completely.
customer_reviews.author: LPallatin

customer_reviews.title: Great socks! not too hot, not too cold!
customer_reviews.text: What lovely surprises I received with these socks. First of all, they are very comfortable and not too hot and not too cold. I washed one pair and it came out just fine. The second surprise is that inside the lovely little bag they came in, was a cute little lavender scarf and some cute lavender gloves. Price was reasonable too. I give this purchase 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: A lady in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased a long time ago.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING I bough these for a backpacking trip to Havasupi falls in November. No blisters, my feet were warm the entire trip and they were so comfortable to wear. I wear them now for my morning runs in the winter. I can’t believe I didn’t purchase these socks sooner in life. Could have avoided have cold feet winters ago...
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, good quality, comfortable socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are a little large on me, but still comfortable. I also ordered another color which fit very well. They are pretty, really soft, and the quality and price are very good. I wear them to the barn when I take care of the horses. On the very cold days they weren't quite as warm as Smart Wool, but were still okay. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanna E. Marble

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep my feet warm even at 60 degrees
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel nice, by they do not work as advertised. They do not keep my feet warm at all. It's not even totally fall yet and they are not working to keep my feet warm. There is NO way these will work to keep my feet warm in winter. Not worth the cost. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying these socks--LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite socks. I purchased them last year and have worn them pretty much nonstop. They are not wearing out; they are comfortable, just the right thickness, keep my feet warm without being hot. I had a panicked thought as I pulled them on last week that they may someday wear out, so promptly bought a spare pack for that eventuality.
customer_reviews.author: Landry

customer_reviews.title: These sock will Carress your feet in Cushey-ness!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these socks! My daughter bought them first, and after trying hers I had to have some of my own! Super soft and cushy. Don't cut off my circulation at the ankle, but stay up in an unbinding way. Toasty warm in the winter, but just fine in warmer weather too. My feet are mighty happy when I'm wearing them! .....1 year 9 months later and I need to order again. All my lovely socks have holes at the heels. Well they almost lasted 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: MissGrace

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all!
customer_reviews.text: After all the good reviews, I was surprised at how they didn’t fit well at all. I’m a size 8 shoe, so that surprised me. There’s not much padding at the heels, so they won’t be good for hiking. If I hadn’t laundered them, I would be returning. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to travel

customer_reviews.title: Warm but not bulky and look great!
customer_reviews.text: I Use as a winter sock inside and out-live in the U.P. Of Michigan. Not too bulky for inside my below 20 degree boots & not too thin for inside on cold floors. Comfy, soft, blend of colors nice, not scratchy either. Been looking for wool blend sock in black color & that protects my frostbite damaged feet. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Is Lord

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy AND warm!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very comfy. I bought them for my son (he's 9, size 5 shoe) to use at scout winter camp. When the socks arrived, they were in a very nice bag along with a pair of gloves and scarf. I gave two pair to him. And kept two for myself. I'm not one to wear socks around the house, but I do wear these often.
customer_reviews.author: Cpie106

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these socks (my husband also bought some from the same seller) for a hiking trip in much cooler weather than we have here in the south. But we both have been wearing the socks, just to try them out, on 85 degree days and they are so comfortable. The socks are crew length, but they stay up with no problem, they have reinforced heel and toe, and they keep our feet cool. The socks came in a cute insulated lunch bag and I also got a free fleece scarf and glove set! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Not so satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Two of them came with large holes in them. I’m not sure how to report this so I am glad this survey is available.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Murray

customer_reviews.title: Unattractive color on really fine product
customer_reviews.text: The color is a very informal looking hunting sock. I had expected the trendy coloring of the black sock which is very attractive. Quality of the sock is great: very comfortable (nicely cushioned foot, good toe design), good thickness for hiking and for cool weather warmth. Good product, fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Minnetonka

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice fitting socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very comfortable and fit well. They're also a good weight - not too thick and not too thin. I've had some issues with these socks in the past. Some pairs have worn out quickly in the heel and the elastic in other pairs has started to fray and fall apart. If this recent purchase doesn't hold up well this will be my last purchase of these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T

customer_reviews.title: Socks
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the fit. The socks are soft, not scratchy. I washed warm and dried in dryer on med heat. They did not shrink. For this price I did expect the socks to be on the thin side, and they are. What I don't like is that they have a "chemical" odor to them. Less after washing but not gone. I suspect with repeated washings, that will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C

customer_reviews.title: Attractive.  Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very attractive. They came very quickly and were packaged very nicely. A bonus pair of socks came with them too! Though they are very stretchy, they seemed a little too constrictive to be worn over legging for me but probably wouldn't bother most people.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Downing

customer_reviews.title: very comfy socks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. I purchased them because I walk 3 to 4 miles every day in cold weather. They keep my feet warm and dry. They are thick and cushion is nice. I wear a an 8.5 sneaker and they have plenty of room. I could have gone a size smaller. They are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: supersonicMOM

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy SWool, but I thought why not to try, reviews were good. Now I wear them at home, not hiking, wore them on 10 mile hike to the 14er and it didn't feel nice. They are warm though and feet nicely..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent—especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so awesome for the price. Colors are vivid and they’re soft and squishy and comfortable.....just as good as any expensive name-brand wool socks I’ve previously had. I just got them so not sure about longevity yet, but I don’t have any concerns. They are high quality. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Breesha03

customer_reviews.title: Simply put - Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, comfortable, cushioning in foot bed, very warm, wash up great , great price. I would definitely buy these socks again! Plus they are constructed of Merino Wool. Temp was -15 when I left the house this morning for work and on my walk into the building from the parking lot I never felt one ounce of cold on my feet. Normally I have cold feet - I'm a girl who sleeps with sock on, so if I think these socks are warm, you must give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: fosmom3

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks!
customer_reviews.text: I was not a believer in merino wool...until now! These are so comfortable, so warm and they absolutely make a difference in the New England winter. I have problems with circulation and my toes are always cold, not anymore. These are amazing and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: nursesrule

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hiking Socks- your feet will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Did a 4 mile hike up a mountain face and man did my feet thank me! No issues with blisters or feet overheating/sweating. Super comfy and did not smell after taking them off. The socks are cute pushed down with my hiking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Asendio | @amazonstolemywallet

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but ugly pilling
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sock person and own lots of different types of socks. I also have perpetually cold feet. That being said, I don't think these wool socks keep my feet any warmer than any other materials (cotton, polyester, etc.) They are comfortable. However after normal wear and washing, they develop little lint balls all over, I think that is called pulling. Same thing that happens to sweaters. I'm still searching for a better wool sock.
customer_reviews.author: Dally Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Warm, durable socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! Thick enough to keep my feet warm in the winter, but they’re not too thick where my feet are sweating. I like that it pulls up to about half my calf also. And the color is nice because it’s pretty neutral and matches almost everything neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Comes with holes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put the first sock on and it had two holes. One in the large toe and one in the small toe. Do not buy these!! And I didn't even check the other socks yet.
customer_reviews.author: Vita Zadura

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, and I did.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and warm. These socks have no seam on toe- Yeah! This is the second time I have purchased these sock because my teen daughter keep taking mine. They also dont seem to wear in the heal as quickly as other thick socks I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Meyer

customer_reviews.title: The heels dont wear out as quick....
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these socks... i have tile floors and they are so cold, i use these as house shoes... there is support in the arch and the socks do not loose their shape and they keep your feet toasty warm.... i dont put them in the dryer and they are so soft, like hugging my foot...
customer_reviews.author: Busdriverkel

customer_reviews.title: Good socks so far!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some medium weight socks for hiking, etc. and wasn't about to pay the ridiculous prices that I saw in-store. I ended up getting these four pairs for what one pair would have cost. They fit as expected, and have held up through the first few wears. I like that they're not as thick as my winter wool socks, but still have some substance to them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spadaccini

customer_reviews.title: Warm but lightweight, nice-looking socks
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be good quality, nice-looking socks at a reasonable price. The fit is perfect for my size 9 feet. They provide warmth (at least for 30-40 degree F weather) without adding bulky weight. Unchanged after several washing/drying cycles. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and packaged with style!
customer_reviews.text: These socks fit great, and feel like they are very good quality, snug and stretchy. And I was unaccountably pleased to find they came in this cute little zip bag with a free little scarf and gloves! Presentation is everything. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite socks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as hiking socks for my daughter and me. We wear them all the time! They are warm and cozy. The foot bed is a little thicker, but not too thick for everyday use and regular shoes. They are wool, but not itchy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome socks!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite socks! I liked my first set so much that I went ahead and ordered enough for every day wear. They are warm but not too bulky, fit snugly, have held up great to regular wash and dryer, don’t pill and I love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Favorite socks in my sock drawer
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. Warm without being stifling, a good solid texture without being too grainy, seem to be holding up well through dozens of washes. They work equally well with work shoes, hiking boots, or cleats. Fav socks of the last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S Pool

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I work out outside early in the morning and wanted to try a pair of wool socks before I bought "winter" running shoes. They certainly served the purpose! No need to double up and no need to buy new shoes, but my toes no longer freeze. The packaging was a pleasant surprise, though. A sturdy re-usable bag with a soft scarf gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: Cute and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very cute and lightweight. I think they will be great for hiking throughout the Summer without overheating my feet! The base of the sock is about twice as thick as the portion that covers the leg which I like because I have large calves and these socks don’t squeeze. They came in a cute lunchbox type pouch that I plan to repurpose into a first aid bag and they also came with a gift that I plan to use as well. Great product so far
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. I bought them for a trip to Scotland and they were wonderful on the chilly, damp days. And they were easy to wash out in the hotel sinks. Now at home they have become my go-to socks whenever my toes get a little chilly.
customer_reviews.author: ScienceTeacherMN

customer_reviews.title: My favorite merino socks.
customer_reviews.text: These may be my favorite merino socks. They are soft and not too thick so I can wear them in my regular shoes. Keep my feet dry in cold weather. This is my second set of socks. Wish they made ankle socks for spring and fall.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy Point

customer_reviews.title: A quality sock for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of these socks! As someone who has spent a lot on quality wool socks, I want to say these are real quality. Four pairs for the same price I pay for one of the well known hiking socks. Nice design and nice height.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Soft comfortable. I wear them for work. They are great for summer but I will need to wear a couple pairs at once when winter comes. If you like long socks for home or whatever. They are a great buy
customer_reviews.author: coty

customer_reviews.title: Good wool socks
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite socks. They fit well and stay up on my calves. Lightweight and keep feet dry. Never make my feet feel hot. I would definitely recommend. I wear these socks in every season.
customer_reviews.author: Comanche

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick calved women
customer_reviews.text: Loved the socks. The material was great to wear under hiking boots and in cold weather. However, I have wide calves, so the sock was pretty tight up top. If you have wide calves, I would pick a different sock or cut the top off of these. Rolling them down made it feel tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Frodo&Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Warm. Soft. Good colors.
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!!! I LOVE THESE SOCKS😊. I bought them for a trip to Alaska in July. They fit great. I'm a size 7.5/8. They're not tight or too loose. They were perfect for hiking. My feet didn't feel hot like they do in regular socks. They're perfect for boots that rub against skin. And they are great for keeping my feet warm during the day or night. They're aren't too think but they are still great at keeping my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Got another Gift to boot!
customer_reviews.text: I received my 4 pack of Women's Merino Wool Hiking Socks and was so surprised to see an added gift of a scarf and a pair of gloves. It all came packaged in a very nice tote bag! The socks feel so soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda T Hodge

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable socks
customer_reviews.text: My favorite socks! This is the second pack I've purchased from this brand. The other ones I wore so much, they finally had holes in them and needed replaced. They fit well, wash well, and are super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Great merino socks
customer_reviews.text: Warm, cozy and cushioning that isn't too thick. I've worn merino wool socks from Darn Tough, Smartwool and REI and these are just as good but much more affordable. Appreciate that they come in neutral colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tanalai

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: They fray at the seam, started after the first wash. Otherwise fine, very soft, comfortable, nice colors. Size is slightly large for me, I wear a size 8 women’s shoe. I have to pull them up a lot. Not as good as a set of what I thought were basically the same socks that I previously bought from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These are nice socks. Very soft and nice feel. The only issue is that they're very tight in the calf. I am very petite and have small calves yet they still dig in and leave deep marks. Still worth wearing, however
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and just the right thickness.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear in the fall. Needed a good sock for hiking that would be warm but not too warm. I like that they stay up and don't seem to slide down. The thickness is perfect. They work with all of my boots and shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: Keep feet warm
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They kept my feet warm when I went to Wisconsin in December. Comfortable, not itchy. Not thick so I could wear with taller boots. Stay in place. I would definitely recommend these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Capp

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing these socks for years, they were always great, fit well, breathable, warm and held up well... I just recently bought 2 packs and they are different! They are no longer snug on my foot, so trying to pull off a slip on shoe, pretty much pulls these socks off my feet. They are not as soft as before and they make my feet sweaty and smelly after just a few hours, this was NOT a problem before. Please change them back!
customer_reviews.author: Malt Zymurgy

customer_reviews.title: Great socks value
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very comfortable. The wool is soft. They stay in place and fit as expected. Great protection and moisture wicking for outdoor fun. Toasty warm too. Best part is that if you lose a few you still have several pairs as they all match.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne H.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous!!!! The fit and stretch is perfect. They hug your foot without being too tight. I’m ordering more!!! Bought these for every day use and wish they came in knee highs. WONDERFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jane

customer_reviews.title: Definitely glad I purchased them and will purchase more
customer_reviews.text: These socks are instantly warm, soft and comfy. I've been wearing them every day since I purchased them. My feet are warm but never sweaty or overheated. I am hoping that these socks will last and not develop holes. Definitely glad I purchased them and will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: They do shrink a bit
customer_reviews.text: They were great when I got them. When washed they do get a bit snug. But they are a very good wool sock. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: china blue jewelry

customer_reviews.title: The best socks
customer_reviews.text: The best socks ever! I am working all day long and in this socks my legs around ankles are at night hardly swollen at all. The warmest socks ever and I am freezing all time. Since I bought first package and wore them for the first time, I can't imagine to have any other winter socks.
customer_reviews.author: MILANKA MARIC

customer_reviews.title: Warm socks that hold up
customer_reviews.text: These are warm, snug-but not tight- socks with really fun colors and patterns. So far no pilling after washing. The length and thickness is good for boots, and like most good wool garments, they don’t smell even after a day of wearing. The colors are bright and so far have not faded.
customer_reviews.author: ELewis

customer_reviews.title: comfy and soft
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and soft. After testing them out on local trails, taking them on a backpacking trip. Coupled with sock liners, no worries about blisters. Not to mention the colors are pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I really like these sock -- but not thick enough for hiking
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be hiking socks but they are thin. They are great socks though and I plan to wear in winter with regular shoes. My hiking boots are bigger because I normally wear a thicker hiking sock. So these socks don't work with the bigger boots.
customer_reviews.author: Tomato Barb

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Thought
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, fit great, but are not as warm as I expected them to be. They would be ok in a lined fur boot, but and they are great here in Florida. Not great if it is in a colder climate.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Tanski

customer_reviews.title: Seems oversized. Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a bit large. I can't imagine having a size 5 foot and these fitting at all. With a size 7 foot, they are so a bit long. Otherwise comfortable and acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 4 months ago and every single pair has completely worn through on the bottom leaving huge holes..... the holes are not from pulling but from general wear.... 4 months old is not acceptable
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brodzik

customer_reviews.title: These are terrible and I need a label to return them
customer_reviews.text: The socks are not hiking socks Just very thin material unsuitable for boots or hiking shoes I wish to return them!!! Please send me a mailing label
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Duncan

customer_reviews.title: perfect everyday-wear socks
customer_reviews.text: Not thick hiking socks, but still cushy. Warm but feet don't get hot and sweaty during 16 hour days of walking the hallways. Writing this review reminds me to order another set today. Better than cotton/poly mix socks.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: love the socks
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought them for around the house, as I already have hiking socks, but I'm so impressed, I may buy more for hiking. They wick the sweat very efficiently and dry super quickly too. Perfect for wash & wear again while out camping, or on an overnight hike!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. They are warm but not bulky. They also do not overheat your feet so they don’t sweat. They look cute but have an athletic sock type feel which I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Norton

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are 85% soft merino wool. They are terrifically soft and warm. During the sub-freezing temperatures of 0-24 degrees F that gripped the East Coast in January 2018, these socks kept my feet warm and dry. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT/SO WARM
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews super often, but these socks are SO warm and soft that I felt like I had to. I've been wearing wool socks for a long time, so I expected these to have a similar itchiness to them, but they're great. Also, they came in a nice packing cube with a free scarf! Can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Mooney

customer_reviews.title: baggy socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are attractive and soft. They go on nicely but then become baggy while wearing and ultimately feel like they are 2 sizes too large.
customer_reviews.author: JennyG

customer_reviews.title: Great socks. Super soft and camping approved
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great. I bought them for camping because I wanted versatile comfortable durable socks. I just wish they came in brown!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: These socks are so comfortable and kept my feet dry and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Wore these socks with hiking boots to the Oregon coast where I was hiking in wetness a lot. These socks are so comfortable and kept my feet dry and fresh. ( I also have really great boots too) Highly recommend these socks. The larger size fit perfect and I wear 8.5 or size 9 shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Peterson

product_meta.title: Enerwear-Coolmax 4 Pack Women's Merino Wool Outdoor Hiking Trail Crew Sock
feature_bullets: 86% Extra-Fine Merino Wool, 10% Polyester,3% Nylon,1% Spandex
Womens winter socks made of warm wool. Soft, comfortable, breathable, wearable, moisture-wicking and odor-fighting.

Designed for extreme weather conditions, great cold weather gear for outdoor activities and sports like skiing. Terry-loop cushioning throughout the entire foot, making the socks suitable for hiking, mountaineering, outdoor camping, cycling and longtime outdoor work.
Package contains 4 pairs of socks.They are elastic and perfectly make it suitable for your feet.
Due to the Suitable Length, the Socks Are Easily Match with All Kinds of Shoes, Especial Boots and Sneakers.
